tintless_threshold_tab.description: Determine how much color shading will be treated as tint based on intensity.
tintless_threshold_tab.additional_notes: Higher threshold will correct more color shading, but will also over correct actual color in scene.

tintless_high_accuracy_mode.description: Enable this to alleviate tint in shadow regions. A noisy sensor could use a higher value.
tintless_high_accuracy_mode.additional_notes: Can be used to run tintless on a noisy sensor.

tintless_update_delay.description: Controls how frequently the color lens shade correction is updated.
tintless_update_delay.additional_notes: A lower value means more frequent updates. The default value has the effect of updating the correction table every 3rd preview frame

tintless_trace_percentage.description: Tracing percentage of tintless to apply rolloff table.
tintless_trace_percentage.additional_notes: A lower value means less tracing. Rolloff may not be updated 100% as new tintless output and tracing slowly. A higher value mean more aggressive tracing so it matches with new tintless output. It may cause flickering.

center_weight.additional_notes: give center compensation weight and if it is 0, it means don't give weight on center

corner_weight.additional_notes: give corner compensation weight and if it is 0, it means don't give weight on corner
